open-source.h1p: This website is completely open source under the AGPLv3 license and its code can be found on GitHub.
open-source.h2p: Thank you to the following open source projects that made this website possible!

contact.h1p: Thanks for wanting to get in touch with me! Here are the multiple ways you can talk with me.
contact.h2p-email: This is my main and only public email.
contact.h2p-socials: You can find me on my social media. Ordered from the fastest to the slowest I respond.

about.content-p1: My name is Edgar Lima, I'm a 23-year-old Mexican computer systems engineer. Graduated from the Instituto Tecnol√≥gico Superior de Poza Rica in the state of Veracruz in 2024.
about.content-p2: I have strong knowledge of object-oriented programming languages, among them C++, C#, Java, TypeScript, PHP and also HTML and CSS. I also worked with some frameworks like React.js/Next.js, Kysely, Electron, Discord.js and Express.js.
about.content-p3: I have experience with Linux-based operating systems, and I've worked in the installation of WRF-Chem and CMAQ in a Linux server for a grant-winning project for the government of Veracruz.
about.content-p4: I also developed a couple simple games with Unity, Game Maker and Godot.NET in my free time.

support-me.h1p: Thank you for your interest in supporting me!
